entries.title: Time & Save Fixes
entries.text:
- Fixed an issue where the save and load system didn't accurately save the time of day 
- Fixed the day/night cycle so the day counter properly advances at midnight (12:00 AM) instead of sunrise 
- Fixed an issue where day/night lighting would slowly fade in when loading a save. The environment now instantly snaps to the correct time of day 
- Fixed an issue where time passed at inconsistent speeds during the day and night. The in-game clock now progresses at a steady, consistent rate through all daily phases 
- Fixed a bug where shop inventory would incorrectly reset to full stock when loading a saved game. Seed quantities now persist correctly between sessions 
- Turned off the Raycast for the fade out image so button clicks can be clickable during load 
- Removed some of the lights in the scene that turns on at night

entries.title: Save & Load Update
entries.text:
- Added the highly requested save and load system 
- Options can now be adjusted directly from the main menu 
- Slightly refined overall UI colors for better readability and style 
- Removed tooltips due to a UI-related issue (will be revisited in a future update)

entries.title: Small additions and fixes
entries.text:

- Made the transition from main menu to game smoother

entries.title: Second release
